title: Ping checker
body: Heres an idea to help solve the issue of players with lag. maybe riot could... oh i dont know. ADD AN PING CHECKER EXTENSION TO THEIR CLIENT?

replies.body: I just have the command prompt open, then I ping oce's website server with "ping oce.leagueoflegends.com -t", if there's any irregularities (ie. 50 ping or over) then I'm gonna have bad ping. Obviously, if your internet screws you over mid-game, there's not a whole lot you can do there.

There are a number of ways to check ping before getting into a game. They are all incredibly easy to do. It leans towards player responsibility to check things like ping before entering a game.

Personally, I like to enter a custom game to check my ping. It also allows me to get 5 mins of practice farming as a warmup before I start the daily ranked grind ;D

Even easier, you can [check out this tool](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/Qgqm11ad-i-made-a-non-closed-source-ping-testing-tool-for-oce-other-regions) made by one of our wrenchmen.
